name: LeapRE
overview:
LEAP Real Estate Systems, is an innovative Chicago-based technology company specializing in powerful solutions for top performing real estate agents and brokerages. Products and services include: LeapREâ„¢ Software (www.leapre.com), PeekaCity (www.peekacity.com), Best Floorplans (www.bestfloorplans.com), and DotHome (www.dothome.info).

LeapRE is a productivity and marketing platform for top performing real estate agents. It is designed for the real estate agent who has successfully built their real estate business and wants to bring it to the next level through better information and organization.

PeekaCity amenity mapping software is a web-based software package for producing neighborhood and amenity reports. PeekaCityâ€™s key features include up-to-date amenity information that are constantly updated from a variety of online resources, the ability to print out custom PDF reports using the amenities you choose, and the ability to embed the PeekaCity interactive map into your web site.

DotHome is an advanced marketing platform that allows agents and brokers to make better decisions about their advertising dollars, resulting in significant cost savings.
